location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lord Minto [Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound], Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a set of exchange, as per the instructions of Sir Harford Jones [Brydges], in favour of Said Sudock (also spelt Seyd Suddock) for the part subsidy to Persia for the year 1810.
